name: Cub3D - Perspective shifting RPG
description:
This is a small 15 minute game showcasing 3D puzzle solving in an RPG world.

Think outside the box (Literally) to solve these mind bending puzzles.

Find items, fight with your sword, and turn the world around as you try and reach your goal.

The game is currently a proof of concept to test interest in this kind of game, so if you want to see more levels or the concept expanded. Let us know.

Controls

W - Walk forward

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

Gameplay

Keys open doors

Sword and shield beat monsters

Wood builds bridges.
